title: OracleAppears
body:
"Congratulations Chosen One, you have freed all the petrified figures, saving their lives!"


"However, your quest is not yet over. 

You must now defeat the Basilisk. 

Basilisks' weakness are their eyes.

You must find the most reflective surface on the Square.

Be on your way Chosen One, time is ticking."

[[ Go to the Sun|GototheSun]]

title: Pick up son button
body:
Basilisk: "angry" screeeeeech 

Basilisk retreats to the shadows of the Dom Tower. The Basilisk is ready to fight.

 [[Go to Dom Tower|Go to Dom Tower]]
